# isPreparedToPlay

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether a media player is ready to play.

## Declaration

```swift
var isPreparedToPlay: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

When set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the media player is ready to begin playing the queued media items.

## Starting and stopping playback

- **play()**: Initiates playback of the current item.
- **pause()**: Pauses playback of the current item.
- **stop()**: Ends playback of the current item.
- **prepareToPlay()**: Prepares a media player for playback.
